subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets are considering asking Paul Lo Duca, who is appealing his two-game suspension for his on-field tirade Saturday, not to wait for a hearing and to begin serving the suspension this week.
snippet: The Mets are considering asking Paul Lo Duca, who is appealing his two-game suspension for his on-field tirade Saturday, not to wait for a hearing and to begin serving the suspension this week.
